underlying_goal: The user wanted to ensure their research paper accurately and sufficiently covered the methodological detail of "sandbagging refusal".
primary_success: Claude successfully analyzed the codebase and paper to make a clear, useful distinction between "sandbag refusal" and "task refusal," which was the core of the user's concern and enabled a precise paper edit.
brief_summary: The user was concerned that "sandbagging refusal" was missing from their paper. Claude investigated and found it was mentioned in the appendix, and clarified the important distinction between "sandbag refusal" and "task refusal." After a brief discussion, the user decided it should be mentioned in the main text, so Claude drafted and applied a clarifying sentence to the paper, which was then committed.
